page.title: 08The Methodist Chapel
page.content: The Chapel was built in 1901. Before that there used to be a meeting place where Walker's shop is now. There are services every Sunday at 11am and at 6.30pm. 250 people belong to the Methodist Chapel and about 100 are confirmed members. About 64 adults and 38 children attend the morning services on Sundays. The organisations which use the chapel are Bible Study, Women's meetings, prayer meetings , Coton Play Group, Mothers and Toddlers, Hobbies and Drama clubs. There are also special services and the chapel is used as a clinic once a month. To help people in the community, apart from the orgaisations, there are visits to the sick, help for the old and flowers are given.
